explains: v. 扭打，搏斗；努力解决问题，应对困境（grapple with）；抓住，抓牢（某人）；<古>用抓钩抓住
n. 格斗，摔跤；摔跤比赛；抓具，抓钩；抓斗机
wordGroup: grapple with v. 扭打；努力克服

sentences.en: They managed to grapple him to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他们终于把他摔倒在地。

sentences.en: The new government has yet to grapple with the problem of air pollution.
sentences.cn: 新政府还需尽力解决空气污染问题。

sentences.en: Managers have learned to grapple with networking, artificial intelligence, computer-aided engineering and manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 管理人员已经学会如何去应付网络、人工智能、计算机辅助工程和制造等问题。
